long_description: Enjoy waterproof, hands-free lighting in the backcountry with the versatile, durable Waterproof Clamplight from Blackfire. Its double-axis pivoting design lets you clamp it nearly anywhere. Bright LED bulb provides 190 lumens on high, 75 on low. High setting offers 10 hours of light; low setting offers 1 hr. 20 min.; strobe setting provides extra visibility. Double axis pivot stand adjusts to infinite angles; clamps nearly anywhere or converts to stand light with non-skid, swiveling feet. Collapse the Blackfire Waterproof Clamplight to hold it like a standard flashlight. Lightweight yet tough plastic construction is waterproof and drop-tested to 20 ft.; polycarbonate lens resists cracking and scratching. Rubber coating ensures comfortable grip. Blackfire Waterproof Clamplight uses 3 AAA batteries (sold separately).
short_description: Enjoy waterproof, hands-free lighting in the backcountry with the versatile, durable Waterproof Clamplight from Blackfire. Its double-axis pivoting design lets you clamp it nearly anywhere.
